overview:
Ronan McCoy has spent the last seven years as Squeaky’s head programmer-technology director-IT consultant-program manager-client liaison. Basically, he’s the guy who makes it work. Ronan takes Squeaky’s original, creative content and turns it into the interactive, award-winning Web sites that we produce every day.

Originally from Jamaica, Ronan received his B.A. from Swarthmore College and spent several years as a freelance programmer before joining Squeaky in 2000.

“Most sites are just electronic brochures â€” they don’t fully utilize the capabilities the Web offers us. At Squeaky, we design sites that use inventive features and interactive functionality that most sites don’t employ.”
